entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gretna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gretna 12:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -26.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -30.0°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 26.
